thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 11 of 99
thread.title: Cee

author: Cee
title: Cee
text: Shipping was quick. Thanks. This was my first time ordering and I bought an APC denim mini. Skirt was massive around the waist. It didn't match the online measurements. I ordered a 36 (true to size). Way too big. You have to size down especially because it's raw denim. Had to order a 34 to compare. More details about the fit would be helpful to avoid having to go through this whole return process.
